profile_data.headline: Data Analyst | Data Engineer | AWS | SQL | Python | Google Data Analytics Professional |
profile_data.summary: Dedicated IT professional as Data Analyst/Engineer with over 5 years of experience in data modeling, business intelligence, data visualization, and ETL development. Proficient in leveraging tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Python to design impactful dashboards and reports, with expertise in SQL, data transformation, and cloud-based platforms such as AWS and Azure. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions for healthcare Industry. Adept at creating scalable data pipelines, optimizing workflows, and deploying machine learning models for predictive analytics. Known for delivering actionable insights through advanced analytics and ensuring secure, efficient data handling in compliance with organizational requirements.

experience.description:
- Collaborated with stakeholders, including CTOs and end-users, to prioritize data governance, security, and quality standards.
- Developed and optimized ETL pipelines using AWS Glue Studio for automated data transformation, extraction, and loading workflows.
- Demonstrated proficiency in Scala programming, Apache Spark, Hadoop, and Kafka for distributed data processing and analytics.
- Implemented MDM solutions using Informatica and Talend platforms to manage and cleanse enterprise master data.
- Developed data models and workflows within Informatica MDM Hub to establish authoritative master data sources.
- Configured data stewardship processes in Informatica Data Director for data governance and quality issue resolution.
- Leveraged Talend MDM to create models, define data domains, and establish governance policies for data consistency.
- Integrated Informatica and Talend MDM for real-time access to accurate data across systems and applications.
- Implemented data validation checks to enforce standards, improve integrity, and identify anomalies.
- Integrated MDM solutions with CRM, ERP, and BI platforms to enable seamless data exchange.
- Migrated legacy files from Alteryx to AWS, optimizing data storage with Spark capabilities.
- Translated business requirements into complex SQL queries to address data analysis challenges.
- Led a project migrating customer transaction data to AWS Cloud using AWS Glue.
- Conducted SQL query optimization, significantly improving execution speed and efficiency.
- Applied Agile practices to adapt to evolving project requirements and ensure timely solutions.
- Collaborated with stakeholders to foster transparent communication and innovation.
- Implemented advanced SQL functionalities such as pivot tables and dynamic SQL.
- Trained business users on Amazon QuickSight and Power BI, emphasizing governance and security.
- Designed data pipelines using Scala and Apache Spark for efficient data processing.
experience.title: Data Analyst/Engineer

experience.description:
•	Analyzed requirements from university stakeholders and designed charts and dashboards to meet academic and administrative needs. Prepared functional and technical specification documents for all dashboards.
•	Developed a data model for tracking student performance, faculty efficiency, and institutional metrics, creating DDL scripts to align with the data model.
•	Created mock data based on educational information to simulate data for academic systems and structured sample tables for testing purposes.
•	Built interactive dashboards using advanced functionalities such as filters, calculations, parameters, conditional formatting, variables, and KPI indicators to support university operations and reporting.
•	Regularly interacted with university administrators and coordinators to discuss requirements and deliverables, ensuring alignment with institutional goals. Coordinated task assignments and completion with team members.
•	Worked with multiple data connections and measures, utilizing individual axes, blended axes, and dual-axis charts to provide comprehensive visualizations for university reports.
•	Implemented data security measures, creating Row-Level Security for end-users to access data based on roles, departments, and zones, ensuring secure access to server dashboards.
•	Automated report downloads into PDF or CSV formats and scheduled email distributions using TSM commands and PowerShell scripting, tailored to the university’s reporting requirements.
•	Tested and updated dashboards based on feedback, preparing test cases for comprehensive validation of academic and administrative reports.
•	Published dashboards to Tableau Server, creating groups, roles, and schedules for efficient dissemination of insights to university stakeholders.
•	Delivered assigned modules and project components, including status reporting, guiding development efforts, planning and execution, knowledge transfer, and ensuring adherence to SLAs for stable operations.
experience.title: Analyst

experience.description:
- Developed a centralized IRIS data warehouse leveraging Informatica MDM and SQL technologies, orchestrating over 20 ETL pipelines and crafting 40+ SQL stored procedures, delivering value to retail pharmacy operations.
- Used SQL queries and tools to perform data analysis and profiling.
- Engineered business scripts for diverse platforms and developed multiprocessing data analytics pipelines in Python on AWS.
- Designed and implemented data mapping workflows in Alteryx, transforming data from IBM Netezza.
- Formalized sprint planning and Agile workflow models, participating in scrum calls.
- Developed and optimized complex SQL queries with multiple joins, subqueries, and aggregations to extract insights.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines for cloud-based data applications, facilitating integration and deployment.
- Analyzed SQL scripts and designed solutions using PySpark.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile ceremonies to track progress and resolve issues.
- Translated business requirements into user stories and acceptance criteria.
- Modeled Alteryx Spatial Analytical apps to visualize geographic alignment and report on summary statistics.
- Created macros and batch macros in Alteryx and managed permissions in Alteryx Gallery.
- Prepared ETL design documents covering database structure, error handling, and restart strategies.
- Utilized Jira for task tracking and collaboration.
- Developed Tableau visualizations, including Cross tabs, Heat maps, Pie Charts, and Geographic Maps.
- Conducted assessments of data structures in IBM Netezza for migration optimization.
- Implemented indexing strategies to enhance query performance.
- Optimized the IRIS platform by resolving bottlenecks and implementing caching strategies.
- Streamlined data wrangling processes for performance gains.
- Developed procedures to handle diverse data types, ensuring compatibility and consistency.
experience.title: Junior Data Analyst

education.description: As a Master of Science in Data Science candidate at the University of Memphis, I have completed comprehensive coursework that includes Fundamentals of Data Science, Database Systems, Machine Learning, Biostatistical Methods I & II, Business Machine Learning, and Advanced Statistical Learning I & II. This academic foundation has equipped me with advanced skills in multivariate statistical methods, cyber ethics, and information retrieval/web search. My education has honed my ability to analyze complex data sets, implement machine learning algorithms, and develop data-driven solutions to business challenges, preparing me to make impactful contributions in the field of data science.
education.activities: Rock Climbing Club, Indian Student Association, Student Recreation Center.

certifications.name: Ask Questions to Make Data-Driven Decisions
Process Data from Dirty to Clean
Share Data Through the Art of Visualization
Google Data Analytics Capstone: Complete a Case Study

member.occupation: Data Analyst | Data Engineer | AWS | SQL | Python | Google Data Analytics Professional |

projects.description:
Information Retrieval and Web Search
This repository contains projects and implementations related to Information Retrieval (IR) and Web Search. Information Retrieval is a field of computer science that focuses on organizing, storing, and retrieving information effectively. The projects in this repository explore various techniques and algorithms used to search, organize, and analyze large datasets, such as web documents, in a meaningful way.

In this repository, I have implemented various algorithms and techniques commonly used in Information Retrieval and Web Search. This includes tasks such as text parsing, document indexing, search algorithms, and relevance ranking. The primary goal of these implementations is to experiment with and demonstrate the effectiveness of different IR techniques.

Features
Text Preprocessing: Tokenization, stop-word removal, stemming, and other text preprocessing techniques.
Document Indexing: Methods for indexing documents to improve search efficiency.
Search Algorithms: Implementations of search techniques such as Boolean search, vector space model, and term frequency-inverse document frequency (TF-IDF).
Ranking Algorithms: Algorithms for ranking search results based on relevance.
Evaluation Metrics: Methods to evaluate the effectiveness of IR algorithms, including precision, recall, and F1-score.
Technologies Used
Python: Primary language used for implementation.
Numpy & Pandas: Libraries for data manipulation and efficient numerical operations.
NLTK: For natural language processing tasks such as tokenization, stop-word removal, and stemming.
Scikit-Learn: For calculating evaluation metrics and building machine learning-based IR models.
Jupyter Notebooks: For interactive code demonstrations and documentation.
projects.title: Python
